users

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • users.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultUser, VipUser

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Class User abstract class that defines important information about users who uses the application.

      • auth

        public static User auth(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
                 throws LoginException
        static method auth used to authenticate a user on login screen.
        Parameters:
        username - string text from username input on login screen
        password - string text from password input on login screen
        Throws:
        LoginException

      • loadSongs

        public abstract java.lang.String[] loadSongs()
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        abstract method loadSongs every user must implement a way to load its songs
        Returns:
        String[] once loaded the songs this should return an array of Strings containing all songs information
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - once loading files may occur I/O errors
